titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Resmethrin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/28/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on [5-(Phenylmethyl)-3-furanyl]methyl 2,2-dimethyl-3-(2-methylprop-1-enyl)cyclopropanecarboxylate (Resmethrin).
